   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to xchangelib's documentation!
==========================================

**xchangelib**  is a Python library for connecting and interacting with XchangeV3. Competitors can implement methods
defined in xchange_client in their own bots. See example_bot.py for an example on how to do this.

Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information, including how to
:ref:`install <installation>` the project.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.


 Contents
 --------

    api
